about.title: ABOUT
about.description: Runespirit is a Teamfight Tactics Discord bot. It aims to provide the most accurate data possible, in a simple and quick way. The bot's objective is to eliminate the effort to open third party websites to get crucial information.

contact.title: CONTACT
contact.description: If you want to contact the developer, submit a bug, suggest a feature, or simply just talk about how Pyke is the most annoying character in the game, join the bot's server or add Phyxsius#1238.

footer.text:
All rights reserved. Website and bot were made with ‚ù§ by Phyxsius.
Runespirit is brought to you by Players Republik.
Avatar made by TMiracle.

commandsDesc.addRemove: Add/Remove your LoL summoner to your account.
commandsDesc.disableEnable: Disables Runespirit on a channel. / Enables Runespirit back on a channel.
commandsDesc.language: Check available languages and change the bot's laguange.
commandsDesc.champion: Champion details and statistics, along with his ability, synergies, and items.
commandsDesc.class: Details and respective champions for the specified class.
commandsDesc.teamcomps: Best team comps for the current patch.
commandsDesc.droprates: Drop rates for each champion tier and level.
commandsDesc.ladder: Current ladder for TFT ranked and respective highest players.
commandsDesc.origin: Details and respective champions for the specified origin.
commandsDesc.patchnotes: Get the latest patch notes and changes.
commandsDesc.profile: Get a summoner rank and other TFT statistics.
commandsDesc.search: Search for a TFT term such as an origin, class, items and champions.
commandsDesc.tierlist: Current tier lists for champions and items.
commandsDesc.items: Items information from a variety of way. Combine items, grid and list view.
